revision.comment: -question answered (sort of) later in the article
revision.text: {{Talk header}} {{ArticleHistory|action1=GAN |action1date=21 March 2011 |action1link=Talk:Thomas Jefferson Hogg/GA1 |action1result=failed |action1oldid=420031882 |action2=GAN |action2date=18:37, 7 May 2011 (UTC) |action2link=Talk:Thomas Jefferson Hogg/GA2 |action2result=listed |action2oldid=427952374 |topic=literature |dykdate=1 April 2011 |dykentry=... that '''[[Thomas Jefferson Hogg|Thomas Jefferson]]''' wished to practice [[free love]] but [[Mary Shelley|the object of his affections]] became pregnant and gave birth to [[Frankenstein]]? |currentstatus=GA }} {{WikiProjectBannerShell|1= {{WikiProject Biography |living=no |class=GA |listas=Hogg, Thomas Jefferson }} {{WikiProject University of Oxford|class=GA|importance=Low}} {{WikiProject North East England|class=GA|importance=Low}} {{WikiProject Law|class=GA|importance=Low}} {{WikiProject Guild of Copy Editors|user=Clarityfiend|date= 21:38, March 26, 2011|small=yes}}}} ==Question== Is it a fair assumption that he was a namesake of U.S. President, [[Thomas Jefferson]], or is this simply a coincidence? [[User:Dr. Dan|Dr. Dan]] 22:22, 20 February 2007 (UTC) ==Question== "After their marriage on August 28, 1811, Shelley invited his college friend Hogg to share their household, including his wife. When Harriet objected, however, Shelley abandoned this first attempt at open marriage" - from Shelley's Wikipedia article, refers to Shelley's first wife Harriet, not to his second wife Mary. Can anyone verify this and correct one of the articles? {{Talk:Thomas Jefferson Hogg/GA1}} == Round 2 == Hope there's no problem with me relisting it so soon, but I think we were able to take care of the issues brought up in the first review. [[User:Qrsdogg|Qrsdogg]] ([[User talk:Qrsdogg|talk]]) 19:03, 28 March 2011 (UTC) == Bug in the date of Death/Age calculation. == Hogg shows as being born on 5 December 1792 and dying on 8 March 1862 yet his age is given as 70. This cannot be if the dates are correct. He would have been 70 if he'd died on or after 5 December 1862 but since he didn't he was only 69 when he died. â€” Preceding [[Wikipedia:Signatures|unsigned]] comment added by [[Special:Contributions/193.113.48.9|193.113.48.9]] ([[User talk:193.113.48.9|talk]]) 07:48, 24 February 2012 (UTC) == Problem with the sources == only two main sources is used,I dont understand why?--[[User:Skashifakram|Skashifakram]] ([[User talk:Skashifakram|talk]]) 06:43, 4 April 2012 (UTC)
